metadata.title: Complexity Questions
metadata.description: Quiz questions that test understanding of time and space complexity

questions.question: What is the time complexity of binary search on a sorted array?
questions.explanation: Binary search halves the search space each iteration, giving logarithmic time.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of finding an element in a hash table (average case)?
questions.explanation: Hash tables provide constant-time average lookup using hash functions.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of merge sort?
questions.explanation: Merge sort divides array (log n levels) and merges (n work per level).

questions.question: What is the time complexity of BFS/DFS on a graph with V vertices and E edges?
questions.explanation: BFS/DFS visits each vertex once and traverses each edge once.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of generating all subsets of a set with n elements?
questions.explanation: There are 2^n subsets (each element either included or not).

questions.question: What is the time complexity of generating all permutations of n elements?
questions.explanation: There are n! permutations: n choices for first, n-1 for second, etc.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of the two-pointer technique on a sorted array?
questions.explanation: Two pointers traverse the array once, each moving at most n times.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of Dijkstra's algorithm with a min-heap?
questions.explanation: Each vertex extracted once (V log V) and each edge relaxed once (E log V).

questions.question: What is the time complexity of the sliding window technique?
questions.explanation: Each element enters and leaves the window at most once.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of bubble sort in the worst case?
questions.explanation: Bubble sort uses nested loops comparing adjacent elements.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of accessing an element by index in an array?
questions.explanation: Arrays provide constant-time random access via memory addressing.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of inserting into a balanced BST?
questions.explanation: Balanced BST has height log n, insertion traverses root to leaf.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of Union-Find with path compression and union by rank?
questions.explanation: α(n) is inverse Ackermann function, effectively constant for practical inputs.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of Floyd-Warshall all-pairs shortest path?
questions.explanation: Three nested loops over n vertices each.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of heap push/pop operations?
questions.explanation: Heap operations may need to bubble up/down through log n levels.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of finding the k-th largest element using a min-heap of size k?
questions.explanation: Process n elements, each heap operation takes O(log k).

questions.question: What is the time complexity of topological sort using Kahn's algorithm?
questions.explanation: Each vertex and edge processed exactly once.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of the longest common subsequence (LCS) DP solution?
questions.explanation: Fill an m × n DP table, each cell computed in O(1).

questions.question: What is the time complexity of Kadane's algorithm for maximum subarray?
questions.explanation: Single pass through the array tracking current and max sum.

questions.question: What is the space complexity of recursive DFS on a tree with height h?
questions.explanation: Call stack depth equals tree height; worst case O(n) for skewed tree.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of counting sort for n integers in range [0, k]?
questions.explanation: Count occurrences O(n), then output sorted elements O(n + k).

questions.question: What is the time complexity of checking if a string is a palindrome?
questions.explanation: Compare characters from both ends, traversing at most n/2 pairs.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of matrix multiplication for two n × n matrices?
questions.explanation: Standard algorithm: n² output cells, each requiring n multiplications.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of prefix sum array construction?
questions.explanation: Single pass: prefix[i] = prefix[i-1] + arr[i].

questions.question: What is the time complexity of interval DP (e.g., burst balloons)?
questions.explanation: O(n²) subproblems, each taking O(n) to compute the optimal split.
